Foodwatch (Dubai Municipality)

Jun 2018 - Jul 2018

Dubai, UAE
Teaching Assistant - Psychology

Foodwatch is project initiated by the Dubai Municipality and developed by Science Tribune Software House to digitize the supply chain of food from production to consumption by the consumer in Dubai, UAE.

I helped in auditing data, testing versions and creating dynamic mock ups using InVision for creative design changes for the web application of Foodwatch.
